desc.p: This is a part of the associated Multi-value set representing the date up to which (last date of the schedule) the Discount Rate/Amount and Load Rate/Amount would be applicable.

The value is generally the maturity date of the contract. But in the event of the contract being amended through DR.DISC.AMENDMENTS, effecting a Rate or Amount change during the tenor of the contract, specified through the field EFFECTIVE.DATE, then this field holds the end date of a schedule.
System Maintained.

A discounted Drawing can be amended only through DR.DISC.AMENDMENTS. The ID of DR.DISC.AMENDMENTS is that of Drawing appended with sequence number.
The value stored in this field represents the next of the sequence number if the Drawing were to be amended through DR.DISC.AMENDMENTS.

This is a part of the associated Multi-value set representing the date from which (first date of the schedule) the Discount Rate/Amount and Load Rate/Amount would be applicable.

The value is generally the DISC.EFF.DATE of Drawings application. But in the event of the contract being amended through DR.DISC.AMENDMENTS, effecting a Rate or Amount change during the tenor of the contract, specified through the field EFFECTIVE.DATE, then such date is held as the start of a schedule.

System Maintained.

This is a Numeric field and shall be used to input to indicate the additional number of days for which the interest on the discounted drawing is to be recovered. This amount thus calculated for the number of days input in this field, will be in addition to the Discount and Load amount calculated. This field thus represents the cushion that could be made available in the event of the settlement being delayed for a Discounted Drawing. This shall however have no impact on the Maturity Date of the Drawing. Amortization of amount thus collected shall take place only till the MATURITY.REVIEW date or the NEW.MATURITY.DATE as input. In the event of such Discounted Drawing being extended using DR.DISC.AMENDMENTS, the amortization shall take place till the NEW.MATURITY.DATE. However, if the same is matured online or back-dated, then the amortization would have taken place only till such date.The input in this field is permitted only at the first instance of discounting a Drawing. The field opens up only if the DiscountLoad rate is input.
